EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email template sent to internal queue to approve the external user registration
EmailTemplate.name: External User Approval Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification that the External User {!UserRegistration__c.Name} has been registered.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This email is to notify you that {!UserRegistration__c.Name} has made request to gain access to UtahGrants Management System (UGMS) as a Primary Applicant.
Once you have affirmed approval for the Primary Applicant profile and their associated organization, an email with login credentials will be sent to the requesting applicant.
Sincerely
UtahGrants Support Team
